data.author: kaaku

changelog.release_notes:
ver.1.10
- add support for Pebble Time Round

ver.1.8
- add direction selection "to Station" and "from Station"
- change up button long press function as change direction
- change screen design with white line
- add direction information with HeartRails Geo API service

- ver.1.7
-- add configuration to select web service

-ver.1.6
-- add language setting on configuration page
-- add geo info history format setting (google mymap csv / memo) on configuration page
-- fix a bug of month number of saved data
-- fix a bug of distance showing of 2nd station

- v.1.5
-- add setting for select save data push to notification or timeline or none
-- add mailto link on config page to send my own geo history data
-- change default value of clear history on config page to off
-- modify to be able to save geo data when web service has error

- ver.1.4
-- add geo info save function with down button long press
--- push to timeline(PT/PTS) or notification(P/PS), and able to get last 20 geo info to Google mymap with configuration page
-- add display mode change function with up button press

- ver.1.3
-- fix of not saved language setting

-ver.1.2
-- add feature of change font size of station name with click enter button
-- add feature of toggle showing of distance with long click enter button
-- change button assignment of language select to long click up button

- ver.1.1
-- fix wrong character usage in english sometimes
-- fix not blinking reload icon sometimes

data.description:
MOYORIEKI shows you nearest train station.
This app functions only in Japan.

features:
- display 2 nearest station name and distance
- selectable language Japanese or English
- you can reload geo info with button
- you can change font size of station name
- you can select showing on/off of distance 
- you can save geo information and push to  notification or timeline(PT/PTS) 
- you can get saved informations up to 20 on configuration page 

displays:
(*1 : 2nd display mode when up button clicked)
- 1st line
-- display current time
-- display elapsed time from recent time of information loaded
-- saved history numbers *1
- 2nd line
-- phone disconnected icon
-- error status message
- 3rd line
-- most nearest station name
- 4th line
-- distance and direction to 1st station
- 5th line
-- 2nd nearest station name
-- longitude *1
- 6th line
-- distance and direction to 2nd station
-- latitude *1
-- request icon

button:
- up button
-- change display mode 
-- change from/to Station with long press
- middle button
-- change font size of station name
-- toggle showing of distance with long press
- down button
-- reload geo information
-- save current information with long press

Japanese:
電車に乗っていて、ふと今どこの駅（の近く）なのか知りたくなったことはありませんか？

このアプリは最寄り駅を表示するアプリです。
一番近い駅と２つ目に近い駅の名前と距離、方向を表示します。
また、現在時刻と最後に情報取得してからの経過時間を表示します。

上ボタンで画面モード切り替え、長押しで駅まで/駅から切り替え、
中ボタンで駅名の文字サイズ切り替え、長押しで距離表示有無切り替え、
下ボタンで情報の再取得、長押しで情報の保存を行えます。

情報の保存は notificationやtimelineにプッシュでき、さらに configuration page で過去最大20個の保存した情報をGoogle mymap に読み込める CSV形式やメモ形式で取り出せます。
data.title: MOYORIEKI
